question: Рассчитай ключевые показатели эффективности цепочки поставок за последний квартал: среднее время выполнения заказа поставщиком, точность прогнозирования спроса, уровень заполнения заказа и оборачиваемость запасов
sql: SELECT ROUND(AVG(DATEDIFF(po.received_date, po.order_date)), 2) as avg_supplier_lead_time_days, ROUND(AVG(ABS((i.quantity_on_hand - forecast.demand_forecast) / forecast.demand_forecast)) * 100, 2) as demand_forecast_accuracy_percent, ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN i.quantity_on_hand >= forecast.demand_forecast THEN forecast.demand_forecast ELSE i.quantity_on_hand END) * 100.0 / SUM(forecast.demand_forecast), 2) as order_fill_rate_percent, ROUND(SUM(forecast.demand_forecast) / AVG(i.quantity_on_hand), 2) as inventory_turnover_ratio FROM purchase_orders po JOIN inventory i ON po.component_id = i.component_id JOIN demand_forecasts forecast ON i.component_id = forecast.component_id WHERE po.order_date >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 3 MONTH) AND forecast.period_start >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 3 MONTH) AND po.status = 'received';
